title: बेंगलुरु हिंसा: हिंदुस्तान टाइम्स ने 60 हज़ार दंगाई मौजूद होने की बात बिना वेरिफ़ाई किए छापी
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: [Update: Hindustan Times altered its Bangla report after this fact-check was published. However, the report does not carry any clarification for removing the ‘60,000’ figure.]
